version_description:
+ Thunderspace is now a universal app.
+ Non-purchased storms appear grayscale so its easier to see which ones you've purchased.
+ It's now official: Rumble Bundle includes any future thunderstorms :)
+ Intro simplified.
+ Annoying "Rate" prom

+ Improvements under the hood.
+ Working on a major overhaul. You'll love it.
+ Remember: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.

"You can't calm the storm. But the storm can calm you." — Franz Bruckhoff

+ Enhanced intro & video.
+ Reduced memory footprint.
+ Interoperability enhancements for Windy and Sunny.
+ Bugfixes.
Please skip this update and wait for version 5.0.3 with a critical bugfix.

+严重的错误修补。
请恢复您的购买：
1）刷卡与播放/暂停按钮的主屏幕。
2）向下滑动以显示设置。
3）点击Restore按钮（心脏，左上）。

----------

+ Critical Bugfixes.

Please restore your purchases:
1) Swipe to the main screen with the play/pause button.
2) Swipe down to reveal

+ New storm: Park (wild, no birds)
+ Bugfixes

+ New storm: Lake Sunny
+ Bugfixes

Enjoying the new storm? Please consider updating your review :)

+应用程序内购买恢复机制略微更强大。 有些人可能还会经历一个泥泞的故障，恢复您的购买。 我在球上 向苹果提出技术支持请求，希望能够迅速解决问题。 对于那些好奇的人：幕后的确切错误是“无法连接到iTunes Store”，这是最讨厌的一个，因为它不在开发者的控制之下。 当然，Thunderspace应该给你一个正确的错误信息，而不是默默地失败。 我会被一个婴儿的响尾蛇咬伤这个监督。 请忍受我 =）
+固定：在某些设备上，Thareerspace在极少数情况下可能会崩溃。
+其他小错误修复。

+ Thunderspace now gives you a detailed error description in the event where restorations of in-app purchases fail. Some of you may still experience a glitch with restoring your purchases. I'm on the ball. Submitted a technical support request to Apple an

+ Enhanced purchase restoration.

If this update helped resolve the issue, I'd be excited about your updated glowing review!

Thanks for using Thunderspace! <3

+ Enhanced purchase restoration.

If this update helped resolve the issue, I'd be excited about your updated glowing review!

Thanks for using Thunderspace! <3

+ New storm: Caribbean Cabin <3
+ Bugfixes

Enjoying the new storm? Please let me know what you like about Thunderspace by updating your review. I read them all <3

+优化

新的：今天免费获得雨天，今晚睡得更好！

+ Optimizations
